website_summaries.verdict: An invigorating, natural bodywash that keeps you clean and smelling great.
pros: Formulated to thoroughly cleanse face, body, and hair
Foaming lather removes sweat and dirt without stripping away natural oils
Cleans well without leaving a residue
cons: Doesn't lather as well as some of the other products listed here

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Vicks Vapor rub
customer_reviews.text: This smells like a cross between Bengay & Vicks Vapor rub. If you are into that kind of thing (smelling like you just left the gym) go for it, otherwise do yourself a favor and pass. If your woman says she loves this smell, she is probably just telling you that, on the assumption the smell will repel other women.
customer_reviews.author: X10Flux

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This body wash does have a great scent - it almost reminds me of a Proraso shaving cream variety that I love. The aroma is just very clean and fresh. Unfortunately, the fragrance doesn't really linger. I understand that a body wash isn't exactly cologne, but I would expect the scent to last for at least part of my day. For this reason, I can't really justify the (somewhat high) price of this product. It's no different than a $6 bottle of Dove for Men.
customer_reviews.author: jesserme

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this as a Christmas present and enjoyed the product so much that I ordered it. I was unfamiliar with Jack Black products, but have tried several over the past few months. They are expensive, but they are of the highest quality and aren't we all worth it?! I little bit goes a long way. This is the perfect way for a guy to treat himself in the shower or bath. I'm very happy to find these products on Amazon. And I'll continue to be a Jack Black customer. And this - or any Jack Black Gift Box - would be a perfect gift for the man who could stand to upgrade their grooming experience.
customer_reviews.author: Elvin Harkins

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo/body wash
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo/body wash. I work outdoors/in camping conditions during the summer and was searching for a decent quality shampoo and body wash that wasn't overpoweringly "girly" or "manly" smelling and that came in a reasonable size to last a couple of months, but not feel wasteful. This is great - deals with all the grime, is a refreshing minty scent (although slightly more "manly" than neutral), and doesn't make my hair all frizzy. I've used it for the past 2 summers and will be purchasing it again for this coming summer.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Has a great scent with the eucalyptus being the most present. Very refreshing and lathers up fairly well. The 23.00 dollar bottle lasts a pretty long time.. I'd say 2-3 months with light daily use. Yes it is probably the most expensive body wash you will buy but it is a higher quality. However, the scent doesn't last long at all on your body. Pretty much vanishes once out of the shower. Still enjoy it though.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Defective leaky containers, Jack Black won't stand behind their product
customer_reviews.text: Jack Black treats its customers poorly. It manufactures Turbo Wash in containers that leak - and Customer Service won't stand behind its products. I will find replacement products made by another company and say goodbye to jack black dumpjackblack.com failjackblack.com
customer_reviews.author: encinimarco

customer_reviews.title: Good option to switch things up.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Abit overpriced like most cosmetic items. I wish it was a bit lighter on the menthol but it's otherwise a nice option for occasionally changing up your everyday wash.
customer_reviews.author: LLWarrenP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing body wash
customer_reviews.text: My hubby works in rendering at his company and comes home smelling foul and no other body wash got the smell off him like this product does. Very much worth the money.....a little goes along way
customer_reviews.author: CrystalAngel7770

customer_reviews.title: Good as a face/body wash, not so good for my hair.
customer_reviews.text: I used it as a face wash and I loved the smell, great for the summer! Then I decided to try it as a shampoo but unfortunately my scalp itches after it. :/ SO now I have a huge an expensive face wash. Maybe I'll use it as a body wash too.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Swan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Smelling Body Wash
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, my wife loves it when I use it. Best smelling body wash I've used. Almost gave it four stars because of cost/value. Good price on Amazon but still a bit pricey. With that said, really is a great product and I'll likely buy more, just use sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: waterdog

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great, apart from the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good body wash and I really like the smell. However, the one thing that may hold me back from buying in the future is the price point. Although, as of right now, I don't know of any other body washes with a comparable scent, and so this alone may convince me to stick with Jack Black (anyone have any other suggestions?). Also, the 10 oz. bottle is a little larger than I was expecting, and it will definitely last a while since it doesn't take much soap per use to get a good lather.
customer_reviews.author: V P

customer_reviews.title: Defective caps
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells great, still a little pricey I think, but I don't use it all of the time. The flip top caps on all of the Jack black products I've used always break after a few uses. I keep similar caps from other products as spares to replace when the break.
customer_reviews.author: Cory M Zaia

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Good lather. Smell doesn’t last all day. Expensive for what it is though.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Best awakening body wash.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Unfortunately this tube had a faulty cap. After the first use the cap was cracked and 3/4 of the bottle leaked out onto the shower floor. Sad day.
customer_reviews.author: Logan M.

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: It's soap! Smells great but that's about it. Do I really see or feel a difference, NO. I like it but at this price I'll keep looking for other options. Way to expensive!!! I see no difference when using it. Still dry out and need lotion in the winter. Use less???? Not really. I use it on special occasions to feel special. That's it. To pricey for daily use. Get the price closer to Axe and I'll buy it all the time. Won't buy again just due to price factor.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good wash, not a great scent
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Lathers well and rinses clean. I just don’t care for the scent personally. It’s a bit medicinal.
customer_reviews.author: UncleSquishy

customer_reviews.title: Pure pleasure
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but addictive. If you prefer to live without pure pleasure in your life, then don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel B.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible bouquet of scent.
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely not for the faint of noses, however. The scent is very strong but the, how do I say, arrangement of it is so very pleasing. I absolutely love it. That addresses the scent aspect of this wash. Down to the cleansing: I've used it on my hair, face, body with very good cleansing effect. But you will need to moisturize your hair afterward, the wash is that effective. Jack Black is expensive but is kept in my shower all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Redcop

customer_reviews.title: Great product, a little on the expensive side.
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, it took me a few washes to get used to the smell of this product. It has a very strong and unique smell (herbal, with a lot of eucalyptus), but I've come to appreciate it. It lathers up nicely, washes away clean, and my skin isn't dried out afterwards. Works well on an itchy scalp, also. It would be a 5-star review if it weren't so expensive- I've used products with comparable ingredients that were less than half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: GoingFar

customer_reviews.title: Feeling refreshed out the shower but who doesn’t
customer_reviews.text: Pretty pricey, I’m not really in that tax bracket so I’ll continue to look at something for about 6-7 dollars less per 10oz. Smells great but not life changing, it’s just body wash. May also overpower your cologne.
customer_reviews.author: jaime jimenez

customer_reviews.title: May as well buy something at the grocery store
customer_reviews.text: Smells like menthol and feels like any other standard, cheap body wash.
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for your eyes
customer_reviews.text: Dropped a star ONLY because this stuff is way too expensive. I live the way it smells but it doesn't have some magical power over my hair atleast. My wife and even co-workers enjoyed the pleasent smell.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: Treat yo man
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my husband. After his first use, he said "I'm going to have to find a way to keep supply of this". It smells amazing. I'm tempted to try it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Maux

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great body wash. Not drying, or irritating and smells nice and fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Lola Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good - not completely sold
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Love the smell and the quality. Only complaints are the price point and the scent doesn’t last as long as I would have hoped for. Unsure if I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Brody Littley

customer_reviews.title: Just average for me but others seem to like. Worth a shot. Just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Just average. Scent is ok. Going back to 18.21 wash after trying.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Evan Van Meter

customer_reviews.title: This cleanser has a great smell and works as intended
customer_reviews.text: I tried a sample of this and knew I had to buy the larger size. This cleanser has a great smell and works as intended!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great body wash.
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this as body wash, so I can't comment on this as a hair cleanser, but I really like this as a body wash. I will say the smell both during and after is a little more light and more floral than I was expecting but it cleans well...sorta wakes you up in a very pleasant type of way. The lather amount is excellent for the amount of cleanser you need to use.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius D

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I've been using only this body wash for 2 to 3 years now. By far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Jensen

customer_reviews.title: So good and convenient because it can be used for hair
customer_reviews.text: So good and convenient because it can be used for hair, face, and body! It's gives a feeling cold tingle on the scalp because of the eucalyptus in it.
customer_reviews.author: nico jerabek

customer_reviews.title: Aromatherapy in the shower!
customer_reviews.text: I really hesitated before ordering this product but after reading some of the reviews I thought I would give it a try. I am glad I did! I love this stuff... It lathers up so well and really don't have to use very much at all in the shower. It smells fantastic... Almost theraputic! I will order again!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hughes

customer_reviews.title: jack black
customer_reviews.text: First time I ordered and used this product. It is a nice cleanser and does well on skin and hair. Great travellng companion to be used when I travel for work, since most hotel soaps dry out my skin. This leaves my skin clean and feeling refreshed. I will continue to travel with this item and purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: betal

customer_reviews.title: Great body wash that wakes you up
customer_reviews.text: Good product, smells great, and gives a little jolt thanks to the eucalyptus. It’s a bit expensive, but my husband really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Llewellyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Father's Day Gift
customer_reviews.text: What do you get your dad for Father's Day when he has everything he could ever want or need? I took a chance on the Jack Black label by the reviews given. My dad LOVED all the items I sent him. He said the scent was not over powering and a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Gal

customer_reviews.title: Smells good though, but needs to be much less intese
customer_reviews.text: I really don't see the value in this product that most have described. Its just...blah to me. The scent is just too strong for my taste. Smells good though, but needs to be much less intese IMO
customer_reviews.author: Drock

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to throw in the gym bag or for travel. No juggling multiple products.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Slater

customer_reviews.title: i've used it on the body so far
customer_reviews.text: i don't use shampoo products very often. one day i'll try this stuff, but until then i've been enjoying this product as a shower gel. great scent. interesting botanical combination that is manly enough, and not over-powering. a little goes a long way too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sims

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Great smell. A little Goes a long way but it seems expensive for size of tube.
customer_reviews.author: JR83

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love the manly smell of the jack black. Really good product. Although it is a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is my sons favorite wash, we have tried many different kinds. Nice scent, not overbearing.
customer_reviews.author: Triple R

customer_reviews.title: my families favorite shower cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Every 'body' in my house wants to use this cleanser. Smells great and washes off easy, and does not dry your skin out. I only wish it was not so expensive. I'd buy a gallon of it.
customer_reviews.author: volitant

customer_reviews.title: luv It !!
customer_reviews.text: You'll just have to buy it and try it. Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.author: B.W.

customer_reviews.title: This the best product I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This the best product I have ever used. I will continue to buy this product as well as recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jennings

customer_reviews.title: The best shower gel I've used
customer_reviews.text: The best shower gel I've used. Ordered the larger bottle with the dispenser after I ran through this tube. Smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST body wash I have ever used!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on MANY reviews, as well as a couple others, and this body wash just blows me away. It is an awesome wash that gets you clean, keeps you smelling great, and is free from any fragrances, parabens, etc. I really recommend this product to anyone looking for a new body wash. You will not be disappointed. I like it so much that I just purchased the 33oz. bottle from Jack Black.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Jack Black product line is perfect now this is a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: David W Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate go for it
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned well but you smell like Italian salad wife likes the smell on my crotch
customer_reviews.author: Joseph l.

customer_reviews.title: Great smell!
customer_reviews.text: Smells excellent. I personally don't use it as a shampoo but its great as a body wash. Always leaves me smelling good for hours.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I loved smell of this body wash and the way it ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved smell of this body wash and the way it energized you in the shower...you feel clean and ready to take on the day !!
customer_reviews.author: Baddboy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wash- use is sparingly due to price.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Hutton

customer_reviews.title: Great body wash
customer_reviews.text: Great body wash, it has become my favorite and the scent is very nice. A little bit pricey imo.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap
customer_reviews.text: Great soap! The smell is amazing and it leaves your skin feeling clean. I will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bolinger

customer_reviews.title: Works very well without cloying fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to have come across this product. It has a nice, light scent that is not overpowering. I personally like that it does not generate a lot of suds and that it does not require a lot of the product so the bottle will last. This is a good thing as it is kind of pricy. This product's best attribute is that it does not dry the skin nor leave an oily residue. Sorry guys if this is a turn off for you, but as a woman it is so nice to have found a product with these qualities.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Williams

customer_reviews.title: Yummy man goodness
customer_reviews.text: Just go for the 33oz size from the get go! I bought this product for my husband because it's natural and for men so he doesn't use my fruity smelling body wash. Well... this stuff smells SO good that I started using this instead! We both love it! It is a little spendy (hence, get the larger value size). It smells delish. It's refreshing. It's natural. It's thick so a little goes a long way. If you are considering trying it, just get it! You won't regret it!! Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Strong cleanser for hair and skin...not for everyday use unless you have oily skin. Smells great!
customer_reviews.author: sebow

customer_reviews.title: That smell.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all with the smell, but will work in a pinch for an at work shower.
customer_reviews.author: cdub

customer_reviews.title: Makes you feel super clean
customer_reviews.text: I love the body wash, I always smell great and feel even better
customer_reviews.author: Tyler K.

customer_reviews.title: Best body wash
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get up without this. Total burst of "wake the hell up" while taking a shower. Best body wash, period.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So this stuff is awesome. Great smell and a good clean feel after rinsing.
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: High quality product worth the price. A small amount goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: John Matrix

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves turbowash, plus it has less chemicals than other body washes.
customer_reviews.author: ChampagneTahoe

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING but too darn expensive
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best body wash on the planet - smell is intoxicating. Too bad it's the same price as unicorn tears.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fenimore

customer_reviews.title: Super Clean smell and feeling
customer_reviews.text: Love the Jack Black Turbo Wash. Clean feeling all the time.
customer_reviews.author: KirkTaylorCom

customer_reviews.title: "Ooh, that smell ! Can't you smell that smell...?"
customer_reviews.text: Despite the price, this is a good value, as it only takes a little bit of this soap to create a great lather. Rinses off well with no residue on the skin. Gets you clean without leaving you oily or dry. The scent lingers a bit as well. But that scent...pure Vicks Vaporub. Not feeling it, so it loses a star. Maybe once I turn 65 and start hitting the early-bird specials down in Fort Lauderdale, the Turbo Wash smell will help me be a big hit with the blue-haired ladies. If so, I'll add a star....
customer_reviews.author: Steve792

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the size. Love the fragrance! It's one of a kind.
customer_reviews.author: Padawan

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff. It is worth the little bit extra ...
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. It is worth the little bit extra over the other cheap smelling stuff you get in drug stores.
customer_reviews.author: N. Harshbarger

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you want to smell nice and feel better about life...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent... It's become my go-to. You should buy it. Have you bought it yet? GO BUY NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Garrison & Kari

customer_reviews.title: Smells like vaporub
customer_reviews.text: Smells like vicks vaporub IMO. Very clean, open-pore feeling. Bought for the first time ever, I like it, still warming up to it, expensive yes but a little goes a long way. Much worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: ... been buying this product for years and it is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product for years and it is amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: I liked the smell and the feeling it gives you after a shower. Obviously its a bit pricy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: If you like the way jack black's face buff makes your face feel, this is the body wash for you. it smells great and you feel super clean after using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Nathan Nuffer

customer_reviews.title: my favorite body wash
customer_reviews.text: my favorite body wash. really makes showering an experience. i prefer to get the big bottle tho because you can control how much you use and it lasts longer that way
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent body wash
customer_reviews.text: Excellent body wash. Smells great and I get complimented on the scent regularly. Not overwhelming. I do not use it on my face or hair as it tends to dry me out. But, perfect for after workout showers.
customer_reviews.author: Philip451

customer_reviews.title: HOW....
customer_reviews.text: can I describe how this shower gel smells being that it's for Guys only...here goes: Remember when your mom/parent(s) bought you your First bar of Irish Spring soap??? Or when you picked up some Old Spice body wash because Terry Cruz told you that it had 18 Hours of Odor Blocking POWEEERRRRRRRR??!! That's what purchasing this is like. Yes, those 2 situations put into 1!!! You're Welcome!
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: Great as body scrub - not much else.
customer_reviews.text: Great body scrub - average shampoo/facial wash. But the body wash aspect is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and it helps revive my senses
customer_reviews.text: Great smell and it helps revive my senses. Wish it didn't have a few chemicals such as phenoxyethanol, which is a preservative. If it was all natural, I would definitely give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LionHeart

customer_reviews.title: Cleanser scent, but too much so?
customer_reviews.text: This stuff definitely leaves you feeling clean, especially due to its strong encalyptus and baking soda smell. Actually, the medicine-like smell can be a bit much if your used to other body washes.
customer_reviews.author: Arlingtonhatr

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Vicks and gasoline
customer_reviews.text: Smells like Vicks and gasoline in the tube. I hope I didn't get a chinese rip-off. Washes clean, but leaves a strong sinus-irritating scent, (might actually be gasoline?) It works, but I'll switch to something else next time.
customer_reviews.author: Terik

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice and all
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice and all, but just not a very good value in my opinion. I like my Every Man Jack better (both the smell and how it feels) and it costs way less. Switching back after I finish this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love all of the Jack Black products! Takes very little to get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: John Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my high Maintenon brother-in-law as he loves this line. He absolutely loves it! Nice scent, not too much.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy and Bill Romano

product_meta.title: Jack Black Turbo Wash Energizing Cleanser for Hair & Body, 10 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
A 2-in-1 cleanser for hair and body. Developed with Pure Science technology. Contains Rosemary and Eucalyptus to support immunity by minimizing bacteria on skin's surface. Formulated with invigorating aroma to clear nasal passages and help breathing. Blended with Juniper Berry to detoxify body and accelerate post-workout recovery. Loaded with Arnica to lessen pain, bruising and swelling. To use: Apply before exercise in a warm shower to relax muscles, open airways and arouse senses, or after exercise to deeply cleanse skin, support immune system and lessen lactic acid build-up

BRAND STORY
By Jack Black

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
